title: India, UK sign Free Trade Agreement; PM Modi terms it 'historic milestone'
content: India and the United Kingdom have finalized a Free Trade Agreement (FTA) and a Double Contribution Convention, marking a significant advancement in their strategic alliance. Prime Minister Modi announced the agreement after discussions with UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, highlighting its potential to boost trade, investment, and job creation.

title: CEOs Microsoft, Adobe, IBM, Cognizant and others warn US is falling behind
content: Top CEOs, including Microsoft's Satya Nadella, are urging the U.S. to mandate computer science and AI education in K-12 schools. They warn that America is lagging behind countries like China and Singapore. The leaders emphasize that a single computer science course could boost wages by 8% and unlock significant economic potential.

title: 'Dangerous culture': Bombay HC slams police for 'copy-pasting' witness statements
content: The Bombay High Court has expressed serious concerns about police officers routinely copy-pasting witness statements into charge sheets, even in serious criminal cases, cautioning that this "dangerous culture" could benefit the accused. The court has directed the Maharashtra government to issue guidelines for recording witness statements and appointed an amicus curiae to suggest improvements to investigation quality.

title: Random Musings: How Kash Patel broke every stereotype about Indian-Americans
content: For decades, Indian-American success stories followed a predictable script: study hard, stay quiet, become a doctor, maybe build an app, and always say thank you. Kash Patel took that script, lit it on fire, and walked into the FBI wearing sunglasses and sacred threads — chanting “Jai Shree Krishna” while rewriting the rules of power in Washington.

title: Bill Gates was a poster boy for this ‘college thing’; but didn't let his daughter do
content: Phoebe Gates, Bill Gates' daughter, revealed her parents insisted she complete her degree, unlike her father's own college dropout story. Despite this, she has launched Phia, an AI-powered shopping app with her Stanford roommate, Sophia Kianni. Phia aims to revolutionize online shopping by comparing prices across numerous retailers and promoting sustainable choices.

title: India vs Pakistan cricket relations: Gautam Gambhir makes a big statement
content: Gautam Gambhir, the current Team India head coach, has firmly stated that there should be no relationship with Pakistan, especially in cricket and entertainment, following the Pahalgam terror attack. He emphasized that the nation's people and soldiers are more important.

title: 'PM Modi had intel': Kharge's big claim on Pahalgam attack; BJP hits back
content: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge accused Prime Minister Narendra Modi of withholding intelligence about the impending terrorist attack in Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir. Kharge linked the postponement of PM Modi's Srinagar visit to the attack, questioning why the intelligence wasn't shared with security forces. He criticized the government for alleged intelligence failure and inadequate security for tourists following the attack.

title: Warren Buffet: I am somewhat embarrassed to say Apple CEO Tim Cook ...
content: Warren Buffett, the legendary investor, acknowledged Tim Cook's role in Berkshire Hathaway's success. He credited Apple's CEO for significant financial gains. Buffett announced his retirement at the annual meeting. This marked the end of an era. Greg Abel, the vice chairman, is set to succeed Buffett. Abel will lead Berkshire with a focus on long-term value.

title: After Pak YouTubers ban, Cong leaders making content for them: Shehzad Poonawalla
content: BJP's Shehzad Poonawalla accuses Congress leaders of acting as "content creators for Pakistan" amid heightened tensions following the Pahalgam massacre. He criticizes Charanjit Singh Channi's questioning of the surgical strike and Ajay Rai's mocking of the Rafale jets. Poonawalla's remarks come after Congress leaders questioned intelligence on terror activity in Kashmir, further fueling the political clash.

title: Shubman Gill reveals why Kagiso Rabada isn’t playing against MI
content: Shubman Gill revealed Kagiso Rabada's absence from Gujarat Titans' crucial match against Mumbai Indians, citing the need for him to regain rhythm. Gujarat, opting to field after winning the toss, brought in Arshad Khan for Washington Sundar. Mumbai Indians, with six consecutive wins, pose a significant threat in the intensifying playoff race, making this clash vital for both teams.

title: Gautam Gambhir breaks silence on 'rift' with Rohit Sharma
content: Gautam Gambhir has dismissed rumours of a rift with Rohit Sharma, emphasizing their mutual respect and professionalism. He highlighted their recent Champions Trophy win, questioning the basis for such speculation. Gambhir also addressed his rapport with Virat Kohli, downplaying any perceived issues and reaffirming a strong working dynamic within the Indian cricket team.

title: 'Rioters are being brought to Bengal': Mamata Banerjee in Murshidabad
content: West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee accused external elements of instigating violence in the state, urging people to resist divisive agendas promoted by the BJP and religious fundamentalists. Speaking in Murshidabad, she asserted that the Waqf Act would not be implemented in Bengal, appealing for calm amidst potential protests.

title: Gautam Gambhir: 'Hindustan ki cricket kisi ki jagir nahi hai'
content: Gautam Gambhir, at the ABP India At 2047 Summit, strongly responded to criticism surrounding his coaching. He asserted his focus is on national pride, not pleasing commentators, and criticized former players treating Indian cricket as their domain. Gambhir defended his past actions and emphasized his commitment to building a fearless team, prioritizing accountability and nationalism over personal gain.

title: Gautam Gambhir explains what went wrong for India in BGT
content: Gautam Gambhir believes India narrowly missed a historic Test series win against Australia due to a lack of bowling depth. Addressing speculation about his relationship with Virat Kohli, he dismissed it as playful banter between two Delhi natives. Gambhir emphasized his commitment to Indian cricket, stating his current role is a greater responsibility than his previous franchise position.

title: Germany in turmoil as Merz fails in chancellor bid: What happens next?
content: Friedrich Merz failed to secure an outright majority in the Bundestag, prompting the AfD to demand new elections and criticize the government's leadership. The unprecedented outcome exposed divisions within the coalition, raising doubts about Merz's ability to govern effectively. Despite the setback, analysts believe Merz may still become chancellor, but the vote has weakened his position amid global instability.

title: Slaps, screams & smashed phones: School principal, librarian clash on cam
content: A school in Madhya Pradesh witnessed a violent clash between the principal and librarian over division of duties, escalating into physical assault with slapping, hair-pulling, and phone smashing. The viral video prompted immediate action, leading to the removal of both women from their positions pending a departmental inquiry and potential police action.

title: Why Gautam Gambhir said Virat Kohli's fitness is unmatched in Indian cricket
content: Gautam Gambhir lauded Virat Kohli's exceptional fitness, humorously expressing his desire to possess Kohli's physical prowess. Addressing past IPL rivalries, Gambhir dismissed tensions as playful banter between Delhi natives. He acknowledged India's near-miss in the Australia Test series and affirmed his commitment to elevating Indian cricket, prioritizing performance and discipline.

title: SC: Trend of ED making allegations against accused without evidence
content: The Supreme Court has raised concerns about the Enforcement Directorate (ED) making unsubstantiated allegations in money laundering cases, highlighting a pattern of lacking evidence to link accused individuals to proceeds of crime. This observation arose during a bail hearing for an accused in the Chhattisgarh liquor scam, where the court questioned the ED's evidence linking the accused to a specific amount of illicit funds.

title: Gautam Gambhir breaks silence on Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's future
content: Gautam Gambhir, the new Indian cricket team head coach, has made it clear that Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's future hinges solely on performance. He emphasized that delivering results is paramount for selection, dismissing any notions of farewells based on legacy. Gambhir also addressed media speculation about his relationship with Kohli, downplaying it as playful banter between two Delhi natives.

title: Adani Power wins 1,500 MW electricity supply contract for UP
content: Adani Power has secured a 25-year contract to supply 1,500 MW of electricity to Uttar Pradesh at Rs 5.383 per unit. The power will be generated from a new 1,600 MW thermal power project within the state. Uttar Pradesh cabinet approved the procurement to meet the projected additional demand of 10,795 MW by 2033-34.

title: Meet 'Champak': IPL's viral robot dog that redefining broadcast innovation
content: The Indian Premier League introduced 'Champak,' a robot dog, to enhance the broadcast experience. Developed by wTVision in partnership with Omnicam and the BCCI, this four-legged robot interacts with players and spectators. Despite logistical challenges, including dismantling and reassembling for each match, Champak has garnered significant social media attention, becoming a viral sensation.

title: Virat Kohli reveals the biggest heartbreak of his captaincy
content: Virat Kohli has opened up about the profound disappointment he felt after India's 2019 World Cup semifinal loss to New Zealand. Speaking on the RCB Podcast, Kohli described feeling "dazed" and directionless in the aftermath of the defeat. Despite a strong showing in the league stage, India's hopes were dashed by a batting collapse and Dhoni's late run-out.

title: 'Virat Kohli is 'Mr safety' for RCB'
content: AB de Villiers has defended Virat Kohli against criticism regarding his strike rate in the IPL, highlighting Kohli's consistent performance and crucial role for RCB. De Villiers reminded critics of past comments about Kohli's slow batting, pointing to his recent high strike rate as evidence to the contrary. He emphasized Kohli's reliability and importance to the team's success.

title: 'Pakistan thought they had advantage but ...': Tharoor on closed-door UNSC meet
content: Shashi Tharoor stated that Pakistan faced tough questions regarding terrorism and Lashkar-e-Taiba at a recent UNSC closed-door meeting following the Pahalgam attack. Despite Pakistan's attempt to raise the issue, member countries focused on LeT's role and the threat of terrorism. Tharoor anticipates a general call for peace but no specific resolutions due to potential vetoes from China.

title: IPL 2025 flop XI: Rs 27 cr Rishabh Pant and Rs 23.75 cr Venkatesh Iyer
content: IPL 2025's playoff race intensifies, revealing significant underperformers. A 'Flop XI' highlights players like Rahul Tripathi and Rachin Ravindra, who failed to ignite CSK's batting. Big names such as Rishabh Pant and Venkatesh Iyer also struggled to justify their price tags, while bowlers like Ravichandran Ashwin and Mohammad Shami disappointed with their performances.

title: Apple to source and produce all iPhones for US in India: Scindia
content: Union Telecom Minister Jyotiraditya Scindia highlighted India's appeal for OEMs, citing Apple's decision to manufacture most iPhones sold in the US from India as an example of economically sound investment. India has transformed from a major mobile phone importer to a leading producer and exporter, with 15% of global iPhones now made in India.

title: 'Nation awaits justice': Rahul meets family of Navy officer killed in Pahalgam attack
content: Rahul Gandhi visited the family of Lieutenant Vijay Narwal in Haryana, who was martyred in the Pahalgam terror attack, to offer condolences. He spent time with the family, expressing solidarity and emphasizing the nation's unity in grief. Gandhi assured full opposition support to the government for decisive action against the culprits, demanding justice for the victims.

title: How Saquon Barkley went from being canceled over Trump to Met Gala sensation
content: Saquon Barkley faced criticism for his interaction with Donald Trump. Later, Barkley attended the 2025 Met Gala. He wore a sleek black suit. His appearance shifted public perception. Fans praised his fashion sense. Social media users changed their tune. They started supporting him. This marked a comeback for Barkley. He transformed backlash into admiration.

title: 'I needed to be ...': Virat Kohli reveals why he quit captaincy
content: Virat Kohli revealed he stepped down from captaincy roles for India and RCB due to immense pressure. He sought mental peace and happiness. Kohli felt overwhelmed by expectations and constant scrutiny. He took a break in 2022 to rediscover his love for the game. MS Dhoni and Gary Kirsten supported his early career.

title: Watch: BPSC aspirants lathi-charged outside Bihar CM Nitish's home in Patna
content: In Patna, Bihar, police used lathis to disperse teacher recruitment aspirants protesting for the release of supplementary results from the TRE-3 exam. The protesters, who gathered outside Chief Minister Nitish Kumar's residence, faced police action after refusing to disperse. Tejashwi Yadav condemned the police response, criticizing the government for suppressing the voices of the youth and favoring criminals over students.

title: Woman BJP leader beheaded in Tamil Nadu; police deny political motive
content: A BJP functionary, B Saranya, was murdered and beheaded near Thanjavur, with her stepson and two others surrendering to police. Authorities deny political motives, attributing the crime to a family dispute over property. Saranya had previously been arrested for throwing footwear at a minister's car in 2022, but police maintain the murder stemmed from internal conflict.

title: TCS gives 100% quarterly variable pay to 70% staff; remaining workforce sees lower numbers
content: Tata Consultancy Services distributed 100% quarterly variable compensation to 70% of its employees, while the remainder received reduced payouts based on their business unit's performance.

title: Rape survivor, 5, made to wait 10 hours for medical test in UP
content: Pilibhit district women's hospital faced scrutiny after a rape survivor waited long for medical examination. UP government intervened, directing Autonomous State Medical College doctors to handle medico-legal cases. A duty roster will be created. DNA samples were also found improperly stored. An abduction victim was referred to a distant facility despite available doctors.

title: Delhi University asks colleges to collect personal data of Kashmiri students
content: Delhi University's directive to collect personal data, including Aadhaar numbers and addresses, from Kashmiri students has sparked concerns about privacy and potential profiling. The university claims the order originates from the Ministry of Home Affairs, aiming to ensure the safety of students following reports of harassment.

title: As Israel blocks aid, 'reality in Gaza is indescribable'
content: Gazans face dire conditions after 19 months of war. An Israeli blockade exacerbates shortages of food, medicine, and fuel. Prices of basic goods have skyrocketed. People are burning clothes for cooking. Airstrikes and attacks leave no safe place. The healthcare system is near collapse. Aid organizations have depleted supplies. Displaced families struggle to survive amid constant fear and uncertainty.

title: Pakistan stock market drops around 4% but India’s Sensex is up 1.5%
content: Following the April 22, 2025, terrorist attack in Jammu & Kashmir, tensions between India and Pakistan have escalated, impacting financial markets. Pakistan's KSE-100 index has declined by approximately 4%, while India's Sensex has gained 1.5%, reflecting differing economic resilience.

title: Who is Ilhan Omar? And why is she so controversial?
content: Ilhan Omar, a prominent and polarizing figure in American politics, faces renewed scrutiny after a resurfaced clip sparked accusations of promoting profiling. She defended her remarks citing data on white supremacist extremism. This controversy follows criticism for her response to a reporter and persistent, debunked rumors about her personal life.

title: Passan predicts MLB megadeals: Who will be next to get $100 million? $300 million? $600 million?!
content: These players are due to get paid -- from who will join the nine-figure club to who could break Juan Soto's record.

title: 'I knew it wasn't a miss': Gordon's 3 stuns OKC
content: For the second time in these playoffs, Aaron Gordon delivered the winning shot after Denver rallied from a double-digit deficit to stun the Thunder at home in Game 1 of their Western Conference semifinal series.

title: Celts 'bit off' as shooting woes reach historic level
content: The Celtics might've finally reached a saturation point as they missed a record 45 3-pointers Monday night as the Knicks took advantage in a 108-105 Game 1 overtime victory.

title: Williams wilts again, sees ERA top 10 as Yankee
content: New York reliever Devin Williams' nightmare season continued on Monday night with another poor outing in the Yankees' 4-3 loss to the San Diego Padres, as the right-hander was charged with three runs, increasing his ERA to 10.03 in 14 games this season.

title: Ravens make 'tough decision,' cut kicker Tucker
content: The Ravens on Monday released kicker Justin Tucker, parting ways with the NFL's most accurate kicker who is being investigated by the league for sexual misconduct.

title: Clemson, ND to announce 12-year schedule deal
content: Clemson and Notre Dame are set to announce a 12-year scheduling agreement that will pit the two college football powers against each other annually through 2038.

title: Trump course hosts Euro's Scottish Championship
content: The European tour added the Scottish Championship to the 2025 schedule Tuesday and announced it would be played at Trump International Golf Links Scotland.

title: Islanders win draft lottery for first time since '09
content: The New York Islanders won the NHL draft lottery on Monday and vaulted nine teams -- including the last-place San Jose Sharks -- in winning the opportunity to have the No. 1 pick, marking the first time the franchise will have that position since 2009.

title: 📈NFL Power Rankings: Re-shuffling after the draft
content: Our panel of experts ranked every NFL team from 1 to 32. Which franchises improved with their draft picks and offseason moves?

title: 'Job well done': Inside Gregg Popovich's unparalleled NBA legacy
content: Friends, colleagues, players and confidantes all agree: Popovich has impacted more people across the game than perhaps anyone in history.

title: NFL experts debate the draft: Which teams have the most impactful rookie classes?
content: Could the Patriots' rookies make an immediate impact? Experts weigh in with their favorite classes and picks.

title: Lessons of the Stanley Cup playoffs: Will the high scoring continue? Ewing Theory in Dallas, Winnipeg?
content: With the opening round in the books, here are the top takeaways that will influence the rest of the playoffs.

title: The six X factors that will determine the second round
content: From players to coaching tactics to pace of play, these are six key factors that will be critical in the second round.

title: Joe Burrow, Simone Biles shine on the 2025 Met Gala's red carpet
content: Sabrina Ionescu, Breanna Stewart, Joe Burrow, Jonathan Owens and Saquon Barkley make their debuts at the 2025 Met Gala.

title: Everything to know about Monday's NBA draft lottery, from picks to what we're hearing
content: Draft experts Jonathan Givony and Jeremy Woo break down the odds, likely picks and best fits for prospects.

title: The worst good players: Which elite stars stink at passing? Who can't dribble or shoot?
content: Among the top Champions League players, who stinks at passing? Who can't run? Who shouldn't dribble? Here are the worst good players.

title: PSG get boost as Dembélé passed fit vs. Arsenal
content: Paris Saint-Germain received a boost ahead of Wednesday's Champions League semifinal second leg against Arsenal with Ousmane Dembélé passed fit.

title: Minister sorry to Liverpool fans over UCL final
content: France's former interior minister Gerald Darmanin has apologised to Liverpool fans for wrongly blaming them for the chaos before the 2022 Champions League final in Paris.

title: Source: Man Utd to resist any offers for Fernandes
content: A source has told ESPN that Bruno Fernandes is one of the few players whose future is seen as secure at Man United despite a battle to balance the club's books.

title: Sources: Madrid want Alexander-Arnold for CWC
content: Real Madrid want Trent Alexander-Arnold to join them for this summer's Club World Cup, sources have told ESPN, and now plan talks with Liverpool to negotiate his early release.

title: Raphinha on Barça revival: Xavi never rated me
content: Barcelona forward Raphinha has revealed his anger at the lack of football he played under Xavi Hernández, saying he feels his former coach never showed any real confidence in him.

title: Brazil want to decide new coach next week - chief
content: The Brazil Football Confederation (CBF) expect to name the men's national team coach by the end of next week "at the latest."

title: Paquetá in a 'nightmare' amid betting case - wife
content: West Ham United midfielder Lucas Paquetá's wife has said their family have been "living a nightmare for two years" after being involved in an investigation over match fixing.

title: Kane targets trophy 'number two' after title win
content: England striker Harry Kane said it feels sweet to finally end his career-long trophy drought after securing the Bundesliga title with Bayern Munich

title: Who will kick for Ravens after Justin Tucker release? A look at his likely successor
content: After drafting the Arizona kicker in the sixth round, the team will likely turn to Tyler Loop after releasing Tucker on Monday.

title: An inside look at the day boxing took over New York's Times Square
content: How one of the most iconic places in New York City transformed from a tourist area to a boxing venue.

title: Risers and new entrants to our latest top 25
content: UConn climbs the ranks. Illinois and Creighton join the mix. See the fourth edition of our early top 25.

title: Five-star QB Jared Curtis to Georgia: How he fits and what's next
content: Jared Curtis, the nation's top QB recruit has made his decision. Here's what the move means for the teams and the 2026 class.

title: West Virginia football unveils throwback uniforms that pay homage to 1965 team
content: The threads, unveiled Monday, will feature tweaks to the team's usual color scheme and a modern version of the helmets worn by the 1965 squad.

title: Grading MLB's City Connect uniforms: Snakes launch best look of 2025
content: From the pastel Padres to the Motor City Tigers and beyond, we break down MLB's City Connect uniforms.

title: MMA divisional rankings: After win, did Cory Sandhagen even budge at bantamweight?
content: Here's a look at every weight class to determine the best of the best in UFC, Bellator, PFL and beyond.

title: Stanley Cup playoff odds: Panthers, Stars are favorites to hoist Cup
content: Every playoff team's odds to win the 2025 Stanley Cup and favorites for the Conn Smythe Trophy for playoff MVP.

title: All eyes on WNBA, but Unrivaled looks to build on momentum for next season
content: After a successful inaugural season, Unrivaled's stakeholders must figure out how to build on the momentum.

title: Rankings, projections, strategy and cheat sheets
content: Rankings, projections, player profiles, draft strategies -- we've got everything you need to dominate your fantasy women's basketball draft from every angle.

title: Bellingham ruled last season's Clásicos. Can he save Madrid's title hopes vs. Barça?
content: It's been a challenging second season for Jude Bellingham at Real Madrid, but Sunday's title-deciding Clásico is the perfect stage for him to step up.

title: Michele Kang is spending millions to scoop up women's soccer teams around the world. What's her plan?
content: Billionaire club owner Michele Kang speaks to ESPN about her new vision for women's soccer and the money she's pouring in to make it a reality.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United open talks with Osimhen
content: Initial talks have taken place between Manchester United and the representatives of on-loan Galatasaray striker Victor Osimhen. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Kirst, Kavanagh or English? Paul Carcaterra's big board for the 2025 PLL draft
content: ESPN's Paul Carcaterra ranks the 2025 PLL draft's top prospects and matches teams up with players who best fit their needs.

title: Friedrich Merz elected German chancellor hours after first-round defeat
content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, providing a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers .

title: India, UK Sign Trade Pact, PM Modi Says It Will Deepen Strategic Partnership
content: India and the UK have signed the long-awaited Free Trade Agreement, Prime Minister Narendra Modi has announced.

title: Gaganyaan Mission To Be Held In First Quarter Of 2027: ISRO Chief
content: The launch of India's maiden human space flight -- Gaganyaan -- has been pushed to the first quarter of 2027, nearly five years later than the original schedule as it races to ace technologies for such complex projects.

title: 'Michelangelo Meets James Bond': The Secretive Process To Elect New Pope
content: Vatican technicians are securing what on Wednesday will arguably become the world's most beautiful bunker, making sure that what happens in the Sistine Chapel stays in the Sistine Chapel.

title: India-Pak Tension Live Updates: India Issues NOTAM For Exercise Along Pakistan Border In Rajasthan
content: India Pakistan Tensions LIVE Updates: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met National Security Advisor Ajit Doval on Tuesday amid speculation over India's military response to the Pahalgam terror attack that killed 26 people last month.

title: CBI Court Sentences Ex-Karnataka Minister To 7 Years Jail In Illegal Mining Case
content: A special CBI court here on Tuesday convicted former Karnataka minister and MLA Gali Janardhan Reddy and three others in the Obulapuram Mining Company (OMC) illegal mining case.

title: Rahul Gandhi Excommunicated From Hinduism For Insulting Manusmriti: Shankaracharya
content: Shankaracharya Swami Avimukteshwaranand Saraswati on Tuesday said Leader of Opposition in the Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi has been excommunicated from Hinduism for insulting the Manusmriti.

title: "What's Left To Bomb?" Israel's Plan To Expand Gaza Offensive Brings Fear
content: Israel's plan to expand its Gaza offensive, displace people within the enclave and take control of aid distribution has horrified Gazans who have already suffered multiple displacements and food shortages during 19 months of conflict.

title: From Blackouts To Taking Shelter: How War Prep Impacts Life Of Civilians
content: The country is preparing for an unprecedented civil defence security drill tomorrow to "train civilians and students for effective civil defence in the event of a hostile attack."

title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs Lawyers Face Uphill Battle In Bid To Undermine Accusers
content: The controversial sensation Diddy's lawyers will face an uphill battle trying to undermine the credibility of the accusers who say he coerced them into unwanted sexual acts.

title: Glamour Meets Grassroots At Times Lifestyle Fashion Week 2025 In Gurugram
content: Eight young women from rural India, known as the 'Dream Weavers' got a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to work backstage with designers, including iconic fashion designer Neeta Lulla, at the Times Lifestyle Fashion Week.

title: Adani Foundation Chairperson Priti Adani Conferred With Honorary Degree
content: Adani Foundation Chairperson Priti Adani was conferred with an honorary degree at the 16th Ceremonial Convocation of Datta Meghe Institute of Higher Education & Research (deemed to be a University) in Maharashtra.

title: States And Union Territories Conducting Mock Security Drills On May 7
content: Amid rising tensions with Pakistan following the Pahalgam terror attack, the Ministry of Home Affairs has mandated security drills across all states and Union Territories on May 7.

title: Late-Night Raid At Restaurant After Madhya Pradesh Minister Allegedly Told To Wait
content: Madhya Pradesh Minister for Public Health and Medical Education, Narendra Shivaji Patel, allegedly triggered a surprise food safety raid on a local restaurant late Sunday night - not over health concerns, but after allegedly failing to secure a table

title: What India And Pakistan Have Done To Hurt Each Other Since Kashmir Terror Attack
content: The already-frosty ties between neighbouring India and Pakistan have nosedived to a new low after the religiously-targeted terror attack in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam, in which 26 tourists, including one foreign national were shot dead last month.

title: Life expectancy in India rose from 58.6 years in 1990 to 72 years in 2023: UNDP’s HDI report
content: India’s ranking on the Human Development Index improved from 133 in 2022 to 130 in 2023; the report highlights the critical role of AI in shaping the next chapter of human development, particularly in fast-growing economies, including India

title: Thrissur Pooram: A dazzling tapestry of tradition and revelry
content: Unique in its grandeur, rituals, and celebrations, Thrissur Pooram draws thousands of devotees and spectators from around the world. It is a fascinating fusion of sacred ceremonies, traditional performances, dazzling fireworks, and majestic elephant parades

title: India-U.K. free trade agreements highlights
content: India ensures that non-tariff barriers are suitably addressed to ensure free flow of goods and services and that they do not create unjustified restrictions to its exports.

content: The meeting is being convened urgently at the direction of the government to deliberate on key issues that demand an immediate resolution

content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . read more 10 animals that can live without water for days 10 life-changing books that will help people improve in 2025 .

title: Things got 'awkward': Jim Knowles opens up about move from Ohio State to Penn State
content: Ohio State defensive coordinator Jim Knowles opted to leave for Penn State . Knowles is widely regarded as one of the top defensive coordinators in the country . his defense last year ranked No. 1 in points allowed per game, yards allow per game .

title: Previewing Capitals-Canes, Knights-Oilers
content: the two teams went 2-2 in their regular-season series in 2024-25, with the Canes outscoring the Caps 14-10 on aggregate . the game pits the Carolina Hurricanes against the Washington Capitals ( 7 p.m. ET, ESPN ).

title: Bangladesh Ex-PM Khaleda Zia Returns To Dhaka After Treatment Abroad
content: Former Prime Minister and Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP) Chairperson Begum Khaleda Zia returned to Dhaka, on a special aircraft provided by Emir of Qatar, from the United Kingdom after undergoing treatment for her illness.

title: High Court Stays Order Against AR Rahman, 'Ponniyin Selvan 2' Makers In Copyright Case
content: The Delhi High Court on Tuesday stayed an interim order in a copyright case against music composer A R Rahman and the makers of the film "Ponniyin Selvan 2" over a musical composition.

title: "Gaurav Gogoi Spent 15 Days In Pak": HImanta Sarma's Big Allegation
content: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma took his allegations against Congress MP Gaurav Gogoi a step further today, making some very serious allegations against the Deputy Leader of the Opposition in the Lok Sabha.

title: India To Have 123 Million Electric Vehicles On Road By 2032: Report
content: India will have 123 million electric vehicles on road by 2032 under the best case scenario, said a report by India Energy Storage Alliance and Customised Energy Solutions released on Tuesday.

title: "It Was About Humanity": Kashmiri Man Who Saved 11 From Pahalgam Killers
content: Nazakat Ali, a shawl trader from Kashmir, had accompanied some of his customers to Baisaran valley, also known as 'Mini Switzerland', on the fateful day when 26 innocents were killed there in cold blood.

title: Post Pahalgam attack, Gondola rides in Gulmarg plummet
content: Over 40,000 cancellations in two weeks have resulted in the loss of around ₹15 crore to Jammu and Kashmir Cable Car Corporation so far

title: Government faces dilemma as aided colleges pursue deemed university status
content: Government recently passed a landmark Bill that envisions encouraging reputed college managements to establish private universities.  The present development could prompt more institutions to seek the deemed status, as it offers more operational flexibility than the private university framework under the State legislation. Notably, deemed universities can function as a cluster of institutions, while private universities will not be permitted to establish multiple campuses in the State

title: Kudumbashree premium cafe opens at Panmana
content: Signature dish of the cafe is special Desinganadu meen sadya (fish feast) featuring four types of fish, prawns, and crab

title: The secret to success is patience, perseverance and confidence, students told
content: Superintendent of Police Laxman Nimbargi addresses The Hindu EducationPlus Career Counselling 2025 in Vijayapura

title: Toothukudi Collector issues guidelines to ensure children’s safety; all school vehicles to have a woman assistant
content: District Collector inspects vehicles during annual audit safety; in his advisory, he says strangers should be allowed to enter school vehicles

title: Chittoor should achieve top position in welfare schemes, says in-charge Minister
content: Ramprasad Reddy asks the District Water Management Agency officials to take steps for improving the groundwater levels in the district

title: Late-night arrest of YouTuber sparks controversy
content: BJP portrays Shajan Skaria’s arrest as a violation of fundamental rights and bid to stifle democratic dissent

title: Mule deaths on Kedarnath trek prompt government inquiry
content: State suspends mule services for Yatra after 14 deaths in first three days; expert team to investigate cause

title: What is the India, U.K. Double Contribution Convention agreement?
content: It was a long-standing demand of Indian businesses operating in Britain to cut down on the additional cost burden associated with bringing in skilled Indian professionals on a short-term basis

title: Visakhapatnam Steel Plant is pride of A.P., says Srikakulam DCC President
content: DCC to organise meetings across all constituencies in Srikakulam district to garner support of the people for the continuation of the Visakhapatnam Steel Plant as a public sector unit

title: Tirunelveli Collector inspects irrigation channels, associated tanks; officials told to complete desilting before August
content: Whenever water is released in the irrigation channels under the Tamirabharani Basin without proper desilting of these canals, farmers say it does not reach the tail-end areas

title: India, U.K. conclude trade deal, double contribution convention
content: “In a historic milestone, India and the U.K. have successfully concluded an ambitious and mutually beneficial Free Trade Agreement, along with a Double Contribution Convention,” Mr. Modi said

title: A.P. Tourism Department aiming at 20% expansion in sector
content: Minister Kandula Durgesh says action plans have been prepared for programmes throughout the year; on the cards are night safaris, dolphin shows, tent cities, houseboats, homestays and island development

title: TTD to improve facilities along Srivari Mettu footpath
content: The main intention behind the move is to enhance the pilgrimage experience of the devotees opting the route, says TTD Executive Officer

title: Left parties hold protest over ‘land grab’ for proposed cargo airport in Srikakulam
content: CPI(M)-Srikakulam District Secretary D. Govinda Rao said: The 300 acres of land already under the control of Mulapeta seaport could be given for the construction of the airport instead of forcing people to surrender their fertile lands of coconut and cashew groves

title: Adisekhar murder case: accused sentenced to life imprisonment
content: Adisekhar, son of Arun Kumar and Sheeba of Poovachal, was fatally mowed down by a car driven by Priyarenjan on August 30, 2023, when he was riding his bicycle

title: Oracle, APSSDC to upskill four lakh A.P. youth in cutting-edge tech
content: Learners will have round the clock access to Oracle University’s ‘MyLearn’ digital learning platform, where curated courses, including Oracle Cloud Essentials, OCI Foundations, AI Foundations and Cloud Security Professional, will be offered for free

title: Three minor Pakistani nationals move Karnataka High Court seeking permission to stay in Mysuru till May 15
content: The petitioners are represented by their Indian mother, Ramsha Jahan, a native of Mysuru who has been residing with her husband, Muhammed Farooq, a Pakistani national, since their marriage in 2015.

title: Telangana urges Centre to allocate 3 lakh solar pump-sets under PM-KUSUM
content: Deputy CM Bhatti Vikramarka says it would encourage State to further excel in the renewable energy sector

title: J&K students urge Amit Shah to withdraw DU circular seeking personal details; Varsity cites safety
content: Jammu and Kashmir Students Association association described the move as "community profiling" and a violation of fundamental rights.

title: Tirupati-based radiologist appointed to A.P. Medical Council
content: The new body, comprising two teaching staff from medical colleges and four registered medical practitioners, is an interim one, which will remain functional to carry out the day to day activities till a full-fledged body is formed

title: Foreign investment to boost Kottayam port expansion as U.K. firm pledges ₹50 crore
content: Proposal includes setting up a dedicated yard for empty and loaded containers, cranes, berths, and barges in the first phase. As part of the port’s expansion plan, a reach stacker unit valued at ₹4 crore will be brought to Kottayam from Beypore by the end of May.

title: Kharge hits out at BJP’s stand on anti-communal task force
content: The Minister blamed the saffron party for the deaths of youth belonging to the poor and backward community

title: Tirunelveli residents complain about supply of contaminated drinking water
content: The petitioners said the residents of Jeba Nagar in Melapalayam Zone had been getting contaminated drinking water with unbearable stench for the past four months

title: Gaganyaan mission slated for first quarter of 2027: ISRO chief Narayanan
content: The first uncrewed mission of the Gaganyaan project is expected to be launched later this year, which will be followed by two more similar missions in 2026, Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) Chairman V. Narayanan said at a press conference

title: Mock air raid drill in Hyderabad from 4.00 p.m. on May 7
content: Hyderabad is among the 244 districts identified as vulnerable by the Government of India. The drill will last for 30 minutes.

title: College baseball Week 12: Top 25 rankings and what to watch
content: Coastal Carolina jumped up five spots, making room for the USC Trojans to be ranked for the first time this season . the longhorns were swept on the road by Arkansas, and the Tigers dropped six sports to no. 9 . they remain no. 1 for another week .

title: Returning the Bundesliga crown to Bayern is a job well done for Kompany
content: germany's most successful club tasting success as Sofa-Meister (couch champions) celebrated as a group on Sunday at the Käfer restaurant in desirable Bogenhausen . on Saturday, the party proper will commence in front of 75,000 at the allianz Arena against Borussia Monchengladbach .

title: NBA conference semifinals: Late surge gives Nuggets 1-0 lead over OKC
content: no. 4 seed Indiana Pacers beat the no. 1 seed Cleveland Cavaliers 121-112 in the Eastern and Western conference semifinals . on monday, the Northeast's third-seeded New York Knicks beat the 2-seed Boston Celtics in an overtime thriller in Game 1 behind Jalen Brunson .

title: This time at UCF, Scott Frost won't need to catch lightning in a bottle
content: Scott Frost is reuniting with the UCF Knights as their new head coach . the Knights are now in a power 4 conference, and there is now a 12-team college football playoff . he is a new coach at the university of central Florida .

title: 2026 recruiting class top 25 rankings: Georgia debuts after landing five-star QB
content: it has been nearly a decade since the Buckeyes have signed a top-five class . the Trojans have yet to make an appearance in the college football playoff . it is anchored by two five-star recruits, both of whom have come on board .

title: Ranking the top 10 players of the playoffs
content: a handful of names have just barely missed the cut, at least one or two of whom might be a surprise . the top contenders for the 2024-25 MVP award, Nikola Jokic and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, will line up across from one another .

title: Power 4 coaches on the NFL draft: Intel on Shedeur Sanders' slide, sleeper picks and six schools' classes
content: the draft kicks off just as college football's spring transfer portal window was set to close . college coaches were tracking the selections in green Bay . the transfer portal itself is also a factor, as the increased movement of players exposes them to more coaches before they finish their college careers .

title: The most astounding numbers of Aaron Judge's torrid start to 2025
content: Aaron Judge is hitting an astounding .423/.510/.777 with 10 extra-base hits during his eighth-inning double Sunday . he leads the majors in batting average, on-base percentage, slugging percentage, OPS and hits .

title: India seeks to halt auction of Buddhist relics by Sotheby's Hong Kong, sends legal notice
content: In a statement on Monday, May 5, the Ministry of Culture said it has issued a "legal notice to Sotheby's Hong Kong", seeking "immediate cessation of the auction" scheduled for May 7.

title: Soldier among four killed after passenger bus falls into gorge in Jammu and Kashmir's Poonch
content: Lt. Governor and Chief Minister express grief over tragic bus accident in Poonch, Jammu and Kashmir, offering support to victims

title: Shivamogga MP B.Y. Raghavendra accuses non-BJP ruled States, including Karnataka, of negligence in sending back Pakistan nationals
content: Following the Pahalgam terror attack, the Central government issued instructions to all States to identify Pakistani nationals and send them back within 48 hours

title: Assam CM accuses Congress MP Gaurav Gogoi of bid to radicalise 90 youths through the Pakistan Embassy
content: Some of these youths said they were taken to the Pakistan Embassy instead of the other embassies promised, Himanta Biswa Sarma said

title: Rahul Gandhi meets Pahalgam terror attack victim Lt. Vinay Narwal's kin in Karnal
content: Haryana Congress chief Udai Bhan, Congress’ Rohtak MP Deepender Singh Hooda and party leader Divyanshu Budhiraja were also present when Rahul Gandhi arrived

title: Revanth’s statement on Telangana’s bankruptcy exposes his inefficiency as CM: KTR
content: BRS working president demands white paper on the expenses of the CM’s Delhi visits, Ministers’ chopper rides as Mr. Reddy spoke about poor finances

title: Supreme Court wants to know if FIRs filed over suicides of IIT student, NEET aspirant
content: The top court previously ordered the formation of a national task force, headed by former top court judge Justice S Ravindra Bhat, to address the mental health concerns of students to prevent suicides in higher educational institutions.

title: Preparations underway for conducting mock drills, says Delhi Home Minister Ashish Sood
content: Union Home Ministry directs States to conduct mock drills amid rising tensions with Pakistan, ensuring preparedness for potential threats

title: Frame guidelines over unclaimed dead bodies, human rights panel recommends Tamil Nadu government
content: SHRC member V. Kannadasan also recommended the State government for sanctioning sufficient funds to authorities in all the Municipal Corporations, Municipalities, town and village panchayats in this regard.

title: Officials in Jammu review plan to enhance facilities for Amarnath Yatra
content: Jammu officials plan new and revised measures to improve civic facilities for the upcoming Amarnath Yatra

title: Supreme Court clears path for local body elections in Maharashtra
content: The Court directs the Election Commission to notify elections within four weeks, ensuring democratic process at the grassroots level, while preserving OBC reservation as per the pre-Banthia report status

title: Kerala Plus One application submission from May 14
content: First three allotments will be published by June 16 and Plus One higher secondary classes will begin on June 18

title: Government notifies cashless treatment scheme for road accident victims nationwide
content: Any person being a victim of a road accident arising out of the use of a motor vehicle, occurring on any road, shall be entitled to cashless treatment in accordance with the provisions of this scheme

title: Madras High Court quashes election bribery case booked against Vedasandur DMK MLA
content: Justice GK Ilanthiraiyan says, police must have obtained judicial magistrate’s permission before registering FIR for non cognisable offence

title: Pahalgam attack | Ongoing crackdown should not come across as one on entire people of Kashmir: Omar Abdullah
content: The Chief Minister condemned the Kulgam incident, in which a 23-year-old youth Imtiyaz Ahmad Magray died during a search operation

title: E.P. Jayarajan to release autobiography next month, ends legal row with DC Books
content: Jayarajan confirms speaking to the publisher verbally and says ‘having acknowledged the mistake, I see no merit in pursuing further legal action’

title: MGNREGA awareness campaign in all gram panchayats of Belagavi district
content: The aim is to ensure that all registered unskilled labourers get work for 100 days so that the trend of summer migration is reduced

title: Supreme Court pulls up Punjab for ‘high-handedness’ in denotifying land meant for SYL canal
content: A Constitution Bench had, in 2016, set aside the Punjab Termination of Agreement Act, 2004 which had “unilaterally” terminated the 1981 water-sharing pact between Punjab, Haryana and Rajasthan

title: Sources: Big 12's Yormark gets 3-year extension
content: the board of directors has agreed to a three-year contract extension . the extension will run through 2030 . he'd originally agreed in 2022 to five-year deal through 2027 . his early declaration of the Big 12 being "open for business" has served as a fitting mantra .

title: Waiver wire: Why settle for one rising star when you can have two?
content: a pair of young hitters who put on power displays over the weekend are among the top fantasy baseball pickups . they're beginning to flourish at the big-league level, albeit for different teams . the 2025 fantasy baseball season is here, or start a brand new tradition .

title: Mike Trout's latest injury: Should we be worried?
content: the 2025 fantasy baseball season is here! Join or start a brand-new tradition . the term "contusion" is not be taken lightly . bruising as a result of a hard or awkward landing while running is an unsurprising mechanistic .

title: NBA playoff odds: Pacers close gap on Cavaliers after Game 1 win
content: defending champions Boston Celtics and the new york Knicks are favorites to win the Eastern Conference . early favorites for Finals MVP include Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, Jayson Tatum and Donovan Mitchell . the Golden State Warriors beat the Houston Rockets on the road in Game 7 .
